Project.Brief history of your project and organi: This data set consists of observations from the Sentinel-3 satellite of the European Commission’s Copernicus Earth Observation Programme. Sentinel-3 is a polar orbiting satellite that completes 14 orbits of the Earth a day. It carries the Ocean and Land Colour Instrument (OLCI) for medium resolution marine and terrestrial optical measurements, the Sea and Land Surface Temperature Radiometer (SLSTR), the SAR Radar Altimeter (SRAL), the MicroWave Radiometer (MWR) and the Precise Orbit Determination (POD) instruments. The satellite was launched in 2016 and entered routine operational phase in 2017. Data is available from July 2017 onwards.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This data set consists of observations from the Sentinel-3 satellite of the European Commission’s Copernicus Earth Observation Programme. Sentinel-3 is a polar orbiting satellite that completes 14 orbits of the Earth a day. It carries the Ocean and Land Colour Instrument (OLCI) for medium resolution marine and terrestrial optical measurements, the Sea and Land Surface Temperature Radiometer (SLSTR), the SAR Radar Altimeter (SRAL), the MicroWave Radiometer (MWR) and the Precise Orbit Determination (POD) instruments. The satellite was launched in 2016 and entered routine operational phase in 2017. Data is available from July 2017 onwards.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use aws-cli to download data from s3://meeo-s3/NRT/, and then use script tools to cut the files into files smaller than 32GiB and package them into car files. We distribute them to SPs via HTTP or mailing hard disks.
Project.Please share a sample of the data (a lin:
aws s3 ls --no-sign-request s3://meeo-s3/NRT/S3A: 441.5387 TiB
aws s3 ls --no-sign-request s3://meeo-s3/NRT/S3B: 443.1725 TiB

The s3://meeo-s3/ dataset contains three types of data, totaling 2 PiB. This time, we're only requesting storage for NRT format data; I'll request other types of data next time.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: North America, Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
